about_me_content: Greetings, adventurer! I am Guilherme, a developer with a passion for everything related to computers and technology. My journey in the realm of IT has equipped me with powerful skills in Web Development (Front-end and Back-end), IT Support, and Maintenance. I thrive on solving complex challenges and creating elegant solutions, always seeking to level up my abilities and contribute to impactful projects. This CV is a chronicle of my quests and achievements.
skills_content: Here are the skills I've collected on my journey. Think of this as my 'Skill Tree'.
projects_content: A log of all the quests I have completed.
experience_content: The history of my professional journey. Each job is a chapter in my story.
contact_content:
Should you wish to send a message or embark on a new quest together, you can reach me through these channels:

Email: clee.vprice@gmail.com
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/guilherme-zampieron-daniel-70b72b229
GitHub: https://github.com/jjcash

I look forward to hearing from you, fellow traveler!
